@@ Dear Malik Saheb , 

Thanks, Shukriya  jaise alfaaz  me aapki tarif karna bahut choti si baat hai , sach to ye hai saheb , ki ye sab alfaaz aapki reputation aur hasiyat ke samne kahin tikte nahin hai , 

You have done a tremendously done a free  job for the community of art lovers. 

We can not ever repay you. but you will be always remembered as god of art cinema whenever any of us or our families/ friends will see the films which u have gifted us. 

However i would like to thank you again for your upload.

Agar mujse koi narajgi hai to plz let me know !!!!

Always yours 
Gaurav.M

@maliksahab..maine hamesha se aapke uploads par comments kiye hai day 1 se..koi aur kare na kare..picchle 1 mahine se mujhe kaam se bahar jana pada jis karan se me net access nahi kar paya..lekin mujhe badi taklif hui ye dekhkar ki aap mere baare me aisa sochte hain..

me har uploader ka dard samajhta hoon kyunki orkut ki kuch communities me mai bhi uploader hoon and mujhe wahan bahut bada darza mila hai aap jitna to nahi lekin accha naam hai...i know how much it hurts when u dont get comments for your hard work...but i feel being specially targeted inspite of always been your true fan..that really hurts

Malik Bhai AOA,
You live in our hearts.Every body who Writes comments for your work.They are really your True Friends and we are all  like a Human Body But have one Heart.Hum sab jism ka aik hisa ho chuke hain agar koi hisa juda howa to hum sab ko takleef hogi. hum sab thepirabay ke platform par aik Community ban gaye hain. humari ye Community Zaroor qaim o Daim rahegee Inshallah. ap sab doston ki Khidmat mein  meri tarf se bhut ziyada Adab.
